description: I have a project and quotas set as default . Today the instances reached 10 and I terminated 7.Then there was only 3 instances via 'Instances',but there was 10 instances also via overview on dashboard.
title: nova quota for instances numbers may  be incorrect

comments.content: I have a project and quotas set as default . Today the instances reached 10 and I terminated 7.Then there was only 3 instances via 'Instances',but there was 10 instances also via overview on dashboard.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~wan-cs

comments.content:
Could you please explain us the difference between what you call 'Instances' and what you call dashboard ?

We need to understand the discrepancy, thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sylvain-bauza

comments.content:
I meant that in dashboard->Project->compute->overview,I saw that  Instances Used 10 of 10，but dashboard->Project->compute->instances,I saw that only 3 instances was listed as follow:

comments.content: I know it was the record in database  not delete，but VMS were deleted througn the hypervisor,May be it is  not a bug，but a wrong operation.Thank you!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~wan-cs

comments.content: from comments above, we should set it Invalid since it's not bug
